name: Jath
appearance: Tidewarden commodore with a sea-gray beard, creased eyes, and a uniform kept immaculate save for salt at the cuffs. A horn-scar lines his jaw.
character: Tide-stern and tired; fair within the letter of the edict; prefers clean arrests to loud victories.
talents: reading current seams from rooftop flags
dreams: standardize lighthouse lenses and codes across the bay
retire to build a quiet hull in a cove with no bells
keep the city from ever knowing the hush of the Surge again
secrets: keeps a hidden ledger of bribes offered to his crews for leverage if the Court fractures
suppressed a cracked-lens incident report to avoid panic
once let a Syndicate skiff go to prevent a bloodbath
